title: Koningsdag
summary: Koningsdag (Dutch pronunciation: [ˈkoːnɪŋzdɑx] (listen)) or King's Day is a national holiday in the Kingdom of the Netherlands. Celebrated on 27 April (26 April if the 27th is a Sunday), the date marks the birth of King Willem-Alexander.[1] Until the abdication of Queen Beatrix in 2013, the holiday was known as Koninginnedag (Dutch pronunciation: [ˌkoːnɪŋˈɪnədɑx] (listen)) or Queen's Day and was celebrated on 30 April.
